title: apparition
body:
“that pretty little thing could shatter your skull with her voice if someone decided to teach her how.”

prologue

She is only seven and yet her world comes crashing down at what she’s seen.From those youthful eyes, she’s watched conflicts arise and fade within the very confinements of the house she lived in. How…

Read more…

title: I remember you (part 4)
body:
warning~ Violence. swearing… uuh hint at smut. 



The next morning, someone with a death wish woke you both up by knocking incessantly at your door. “Y/N! Come on. Up. Change of plans.” You grumbled and wiggled out of Bucky’s arms, picking up his shirt and throwing it on since it was big enough to cover you so you could answer the door with a snarl. “What Stark?!” You glared at the man and he pushed passed you into your room, freezing in place as he saw Bucky now sitting up in your bed, barely covered with the blanket. “Well alright then.” He shook his head. “Change of plans. You’re both coming with us to that base in Russia. We’ve got some intelligence that there are plenty of bad guys’ asses for you both to kick. Meet in the hanger ready to go in 20. We’ll fill you both in to the rest of the plan on the way.” “Fine Stark. Out.” You held the door open and motioned for him to exit, closing it a bit harder than necessary once he was through. You sighed and ran your hand across your face as you took a breath, trying to wake yourself up. “Ok.” You picked up Bucky’s pants and tossed them to him as he stood up. “I’ll meet you in the hanger.” “Am I getting my shirt back?” He smirked and you just shook your head. “Nope. Is mine now.” You pulled him to you to plant a kiss on his lips, but he pulled you tighter against him and deepened the kiss, squeezing your bare ass with his flesh hand causing you to squeak. He chuckled as he released you. “See you in 20.”

You were still strapping throwing knives into place as you made your way up the ramp into the quinjet. “Doll.” You looked up to see Bucky already standing there, ready to go with a cup of coffee held out to you. You smiled and kissed his cheek as you took the cup. “You might have just saved Tony’s life.” He just chuckled and followed you over to your seat next to Steve. “Mornin Y/N. You seem… Different.” He looks between you and Bucky for a moment. “They finally hooked up.” Tony stated as he walked over to you. “Oh. Good.” Steve nodded and you almost choked on your coffee. “Did everyone…” “Yeah pretty much.” Clint said, passing what looked like a 20 to Natasha. You rolled your eyes and sighed, then leaned into Bucky’s side with a shrug. “Just took some of Thor’s whiskey to get me to fess up.” “Ha! Told you it’d be her.” Wanda pointed at Steve. “Can we focus?” Bucky interrupted. “What’s the plan?” “You and Cap are going to be clearing levels in front of Wanda and Y/N as they make their way towards the basement…” “Where the cells are.” You spoke up as Tony provided a holographic map of the building lay out according to your memory. “Correct. We believe there are a couple of doctors that may or may not be willingly helping Hydra.” “Natasha and I are going to be getting everything we can out of the computers.” Tony pointed to the area where you believed the main computers were. “Sure. We’ll do all the hard stuff as usual.” Bucky squeezed your shoulders with his arm and you just smiled. “It’s aight. We got this.”

You spent the rest of the ride sipping your coffee and trying to scour your memory to pinpoint where everything was exactly so there were no unnecessary surprises. “Doll?” “Hmm?” You didn’t look up from the map. “Y/N?” Bucky said softer this time, causing you to meet his eyes. He tilted his head slightly and you nodded, and leaned against him for a second. “We got this.” You gave him a reassuring smile and returned your attention to the map.

An hour later, Clint spoke up from his spot in the pilot’s seat. “Alright boys and girls. We’re here.” You walked up and pointed to a spot where you knew you could land. “Bring her down over there. The door’s right there. We should be able to get in unnoticed if we come from this side.” He nodded and silently landed the quinjet where you pointed. One final check of weapons, and you all filed out. Tony took the lead, letting his tech scan for heat signatures, motioning to Nat where they were so she could take them out quickly and quietly. The door was locked, but it was easy enough for Wanda to use her magic to move the tumblers, and Steve and Bucky poured in as soon as the lock clicked, immediately taking out two guards just inside. Your team moved silent and deadly through the halls until you made it to the split up point. Tony and Natasha ducked off to find the computers, and Bucky and Steve started to descend the stairs with you and Wanda following closely behind. The boys took out one Hydra operative after another as you all made your way down. Finally you came to the door you knew well enough. “Ok. Just through here.” Muffled screams of agony filled the air then, and caused you to flinch, but you quickly shook it off as Wanda unlocked this door as easily as she had the first.

Steve and Bucky filed in and opened fire on the soldiers already raising their guns at you as you flung a knife into the temple of the man with the scalpel standing over the doctor strapped to the chair. “Fuck you asshole. I told you I’d kill you.” You spat out in Russian as you made your way over to the doctor. “Hey. You’re the one that helped me out aren’t you?” You spoke in Russian to the man who nodded, but responded in English. “Yes. I don’t know if you remember me, but we used to work together. This is the second time you’ve saved my life.” “You’re not safe yet.” Bucky barked. “We’ll get you out of here.” You began to undo his restraints, then let your magic wash over him, healing his more important wounds. “Is there anyone else down here?” Steve said as he kept his eye on the doorway. “No. They killed everyone else that let you escape. They were hoping I could tell them where you went.” You sighed. “Ok. What did you give them?” “I gave up one of your safe houses, but hopefully it’s a dead one.” “Most of them are.” You helped the man stand up and started to lead him out the door.

Just as you passed the threshold a bullet exploded the doctor’s head, and half a second later, there was a barrel digging into your temple and one more soldier with his gun to Wanda’s head. “Drop em boys. I don’t want to kill my favorite little toy just yet, but I will.” The man had the gun pressed against your temple and used his other hand to slide up your body to grope your breast, then down the front of your suit. “Don’t.” Bucky took a half step forward, and the man dug the gun into your head further. “Asset?” His voice piqued in curiosity. “Well… Hmm… two for one. Lucky me.” He grinned and began speaking in Russian. “Longing.” “No!” Steve took a step this time. “Back off star spangled idiot. I’ll kill them both.” “Rusted.” Bucky growled. “Please…” You whispered as you pressed your body against his, grinding your ass into his crotch slightly. “Please let them go. You can keep me.” He grabbed your hair and yanked your head to the side, then growled in your ear. “Oh I’m keeping you both baby.” Then licked your neck. “Hmm… Seems like someone else has had you recently.” “Yeah him!” You slammed your head into his and at the same time, flung a knife into the throat of the man holding a gun to Wanda. You spun around and kicked the man’s legs out from under him, causing him to squeeze the trigger during his fall, and you quickly shoved a knife into his throat not noticing the bullet had gone into your torso. You quickly turned around to make sure everyone else was alright. “Bucky?! You good?” “Doll… Patch yourself up before you worry about me.” “Huh?” You looked down as the adrenaline ceased enough that you felt the pain. “Ow!” You threw your hand over the wound as white light poured from it. “Shit. I can’t until we get the bullet out. I’ll be fine though. Nothing major was hit.”

You all made it back to the quinjet quickly as you took out the rest of the soldiers you came across, and once inside, Nat and Wanda rushed to your side as you pulled your top off, causing Bucky, Steve and Tony to turn their backs to you as Clint brought you all into the air. “I’m alright. Wanda, just move it out.” “Yeah yeah.” She waved her fingers and you dug yours into the table as it tore it’s way out of you through her magic. “There. All done.” The bullet plinked into a bowl and you begun to heal yourself. “Did you get everything you needed?” You looked up at Tony who still had his back to you. “Yeah. We got everything. I take it there were no survivors.” “No. We were too late.” You sighed as you pulled your top back up and zipped it. “Nevermind that. Are you alright?” Bucky walked over to you, concern filling his expression as he looked over you. “Yeah I’m fine.” “That Doctor. Did you remember him? From your old days?” Steve said and Bucky tightened his hand on yours knowing damn well that any mention of your old life upset you. “No. I mean, not really. I remember his face, but I don’t remember his name. I remember that he was a friend, and he was there against his will just like I was, but, everything else is blank.” Bucky wrapped his arm around your shoulders and you rested your head against him. “Alright. Let’s go home.”


Later that night, a familiar knock brought you back from your thoughts as you combed through your hair, just staring out the window. “Come on in.” “Hey Doll. I brought hot cocoa. Extra marshmallows.” Bucky grinned as he walked over and sat yours on the desk next to you. “Thank you.” You gave him a weak smile. “Here. Come here.” He sat his own cup down, then lead you over to the bed. “Take your shirt off and lay down.” You tilted your head in question, but followed his orders, laying on your stomach. He reached into his pocket and pulled out a small bottle of warming massage gel. “I know you carry all your stress in your shoulders, and honestly I’ve been wanting to massage your shoulders and your back for months, and well since we fucked last night, I’m guessing I’m allowed to now.” You chuckled and nodded. “Good luck though. My back’s pretty much just one giant knot.” “Just relax.” He whispered as he began to work one knot out of your shoulder, causing a little moan to slip passed your lips, and he just smiled as he continued working on your back. At one point he straddled your ass and moved just right and dug his erection into your ass accidentally, but still causing a grunt of a moan to come from him. “Sorry. You make such pretty sounds. I can’t help it.” You grinned and wriggled your ass into him. “No need to apologize as long as you promise to put it to use.” His fingers dug into your sides as he ground into your ass again. “Whatever you wish Y/N.” He bent down and bit your shoulder causing you to moan and squirm under him.

Come here.” He sat his own cup down, then lead you over to the bed. “Take your shirt off and lay down.” You tilted your head in question, but followed his orders, laying on your stomach. He reached into his pocket and pulled out a small bottle of warming massage gel. “I know you carry all your stress in your shoulders, and honestly I’ve been wanting to massage your shoulders and your back for months, and well since we fucked last night, I’m guessing I’m allowed to now.” You chuckled and nodded. “Good luck though. My back’s pretty much just one giant knot.” “Just relax.” He whispered as he began to work one knot out of your shoulder, causing a little moan to slip passed your lips, and he just smiled as he continued working on your back. At one point he straddled your ass and moved just right and dug his erection into your ass accidentally, but still causing a grunt of a moan to come from him. “Sorry. You make such pretty sounds. I can’t help it.” You grinned and wriggled your ass into him. “No need to apologize as long as you promise to put it to use.” His fingers dug into your sides as he ground into your ass again. “Whatever you wish Y/N.” He bent down and bit your shoulder causing you to moan and squirm under him.

warning~ Violence. swearing… uuh hint at smut. 



The next morning, someone with a death wish woke you both up by knocking incessantly at your door. “Y/N! Come on. Up. Change of plans.” You grumbled and wiggled out of Bucky’s arms, picking up his shirt and throwing it on since it was big enough to cover you so you could answer the door with a snarl. “What Stark?!” You glared at the man and he pushed passed you into your room, freezing in place as he saw Bucky now sitting up in your bed, barely covered with the blanket. “Well alright then.” He shook his head. “Change of plans. You’re both coming with us to that base in Russia. We’ve got some intelligence that there are plenty of bad guys’ asses for you both to kick. Meet in the hanger ready to go in 20. We’ll fill you both in to the rest of the plan on the way.” “Fine Stark. Out.” You held the door open and motioned for him to exit, closing it a bit harder than necessary once he was through. You sighed and ran your hand across your face as you took a breath, trying to wake yourself up. “Ok.” You picked up Bucky’s pants and tossed them to him as he stood up. “I’ll meet you in the hanger.” “Am I getting my shirt back?” He smirked and you just shook your head. “Nope. Is mine now.” You pulled him to you to plant a kiss on his lips, but he pulled you tighter against him and deepened the kiss, squeezing your bare ass with his flesh hand causing you to squeak. He chuckled as he released you. “See you in 20.”

You were still strapping throwing knives into place as you made your way up the ramp into the quinjet. “Doll.” You looked up to see Bucky already standing there, ready to go with a cup of coffee held out to you. You smiled and kissed his cheek as you took the cup. “You might have just saved Tony’s life.” He just chuckled and followed you over to your seat next to Steve. “Mornin Y/N. You seem… Different.” He looks between you and Bucky for a moment. “They finally hooked up.” Tony stated as he walked over to you. “Oh. Good.” Steve nodded and you almost choked on your coffee. “Did everyone…” “Yeah pretty much.” Clint said, passing what looked like a 20 to Natasha. You rolled your eyes and sighed, then leaned into Bucky’s side with a shrug. “Just took some of Thor’s whiskey to get me to fess up.” “Ha! Told you it’d be her.” Wanda pointed at Steve. “Can we focus?” Bucky interrupted. “What’s the plan?” “You and Cap are going to be clearing levels in front of Wanda and Y/N as they make their way towards the basement…” “Where the cells are.” You spoke up as Tony provided a holographic map of the building lay out according to your memory. “Correct. We believe there are a couple of doctors that may or may not be willingly helping Hydra.” “Natasha and I are going to be getting everything we can out of the computers.” Tony pointed to the area where you believed the main computers were. “Sure. We’ll do all the hard stuff as usual.” Bucky squeezed your shoulders with his arm and you just smiled. “It’s aight. We got this.”

You spent the rest of the ride sipping your coffee and trying to scour your memory to pinpoint where everything was exactly so there were no unnecessary surprises. “Doll?” “Hmm?” You didn’t look up from the map. “Y/N?” Bucky said softer this time, causing you to meet his eyes. He tilted his head slightly and you nodded, and leaned against him for a second. “We got this.” You gave him a reassuring smile and returned your attention to the map.

An hour later, Clint spoke up from his spot in the pilot’s seat. “Alright boys and girls. We’re here.” You walked up and pointed to a spot where you knew you could land. “Bring her down over there. The door’s right there. We should be able to get in unnoticed if we come from this side.” He nodded and silently landed the quinjet where you pointed. One final check of weapons, and you all filed out. Tony took the lead, letting his tech scan for heat signatures, motioning to Nat where they were so she could take them out quickly and quietly. The door was locked, but it was easy enough for Wanda to use her magic to move the tumblers, and Steve and Bucky poured in as soon as the lock clicked, immediately taking out two guards just inside. Your team moved silent and deadly through the halls until you made it to the split up point. Tony and Natasha ducked off to find the computers, and Bucky and Steve started to descend the stairs with you and Wanda following closely behind. The boys took out one Hydra operative after another as you all made your way down. Finally you came to the door you knew well enough. “Ok. Just through here.” Muffled screams of agony filled the air then, and caused you to flinch, but you quickly shook it off as Wanda unlocked this door as easily as she had the first.

Steve and Bucky filed in and opened fire on the soldiers already raising their guns at you as you flung a knife into the temple of the man with the scalpel standing over the doctor strapped to the chair. “Fuck you asshole. I told you I’d kill you.” You spat out in Russian as you made your way over to the doctor. “Hey. You’re the one that helped me out aren’t you?” You spoke in Russian to the man who nodded, but responded in English. “Yes. I don’t know if you remember me, but we used to work together. This is the second time you’ve saved my life.” “You’re not safe yet.” Bucky barked. “We’ll get you out of here.” You began to undo his restraints, then let your magic wash over him, healing his more important wounds. “Is there anyone else down here?” Steve said as he kept his eye on the doorway. “No. They killed everyone else that let you escape. They were hoping I could tell them where you went.” You sighed. “Ok. What did you give them?” “I gave up one of your safe houses, but hopefully it’s a dead one.” “Most of them are.” You helped the man stand up and started to lead him out the door.

Just as you passed the threshold a bullet exploded the doctor’s head, and half a second later, there was a barrel digging into your temple and one more soldier with his gun to Wanda’s head. “Drop em boys. I don’t want to kill my favorite little toy just yet, but I will.” The man had the gun pressed against your temple and used his other hand to slide up your body to grope your breast, then down the front of your suit. “Don’t.” Bucky took a half step forward, and the man dug the gun into your head further. “Asset?” His voice piqued in curiosity. “Well… Hmm… two for one. Lucky me.” He grinned and began speaking in Russian. “Longing.” “No!” Steve took a step this time. “Back off star spangled idiot. I’ll kill them both.” “Rusted.” Bucky growled. “Please…” You whispered as you pressed your body against his, grinding your ass into his crotch slightly. “Please let them go. You can keep me.” He grabbed your hair and yanked your head to the side, then growled in your ear. “Oh I’m keeping you both baby.” Then licked your neck. “Hmm… Seems like someone else has had you recently.” “Yeah him!” You slammed your head into his and at the same time, flung a knife into the throat of the man holding a gun to Wanda. You spun around and kicked the man’s legs out from under him, causing him to squeeze the trigger during his fall, and you quickly shoved a knife into his throat not noticing the bullet had gone into your torso. You quickly turned around to make sure everyone else was alright. “Bucky?! You good?” “Doll… Patch yourself up before you worry about me.” “Huh?” You looked down as the adrenaline ceased enough that you felt the pain. “Ow!” You threw your hand over the wound as white light poured from it. “Shit. I can’t until we get the bullet out. I’ll be fine though. Nothing major was hit.”

You all made it back to the quinjet quickly as you took out the rest of the soldiers you came across, and once inside, Nat and Wanda rushed to your side as you pulled your top off, causing Bucky, Steve and Tony to turn their backs to you as Clint brought you all into the air. “I’m alright. Wanda, just move it out.” “Yeah yeah.” She waved her fingers and you dug yours into the table as it tore it’s way out of you through her magic. “There. All done.” The bullet plinked into a bowl and you begun to heal yourself. “Did you get everything you needed?” You looked up at Tony who still had his back to you. “Yeah. We got everything. I take it there were no survivors.” “No. We were too late.” You sighed as you pulled your top back up and zipped it. “Nevermind that. Are you alright?” Bucky walked over to you, concern filling his expression as he looked over you. “Yeah I’m fine.” “That Doctor. Did you remember him? From your old days?” Steve said and Bucky tightened his hand on yours knowing damn well that any mention of your old life upset you. “No. I mean, not really. I remember his face, but I don’t remember his name. I remember that he was a friend, and he was there against his will just like I was, but, everything else is blank.” Bucky wrapped his arm around your shoulders and you rested your head against him. “Alright. Let’s go home.”


Later that night, a familiar knock brought you back from your thoughts as you combed through your hair, just staring out the window. “Come on in.” “Hey Doll. I brought hot cocoa. title: Archaic Kinds Of Fun
body:
What’s the most impossible job you can think of? For Jo Holbrook, The Tank, Killer Extradonaire…it’s being a bodyguard. Leave it to Fury to kick it up a notch. Now she’s playing chauffeur for Tony Stark and trying to figure out where her life went wrong. At least there’s pancakes.

For The Record

November 1, 2014DARCY“Yo, Skye! You in here?!” Darcy called out as she walked into Tony’s lab. She heard music, and she knew Tony wasn’t playing it because he was out on a date with Pepper…

title: Can’t Sleep pt.9 (Loki x reader)
body:
A/N: I’m gonna kill y’all I’m so sorry but don’t worry this isn’t the last chapter. Also, this is a slightly altered version of Infinity war/Ragnarok so it would fit with the continuity with my story so sorry if it’s a bit messy 

Warnings: Angst 

Words: 857

Masterlist

Loki had walked over to your hospital bed, staring at you whilst you slept as he tried to figure out what he was going to do about his current situation. Thor had sent him a message from Asgard of all places, that the land was under threat and he needed Loki to help him reclaim the throne. That could only mean one thing. His father was dead. It wasn’t even that long ago that Loki could remember wanting that throne for himself. Wanting to take what his father was going to pass on to Thor. Wanting what he knew he would never get. Now…he wanted nothing to do with any of that. All he wanted was you.

He rested his eyes on you again and a small tear fell down his cheek as you continued to sleep. He wanted to tell you where he was going, what was going on, and more importantly; that he would be back to hold you in his arms once again and that he was going to be back. But it was better not to explain. You wouldn’t let him leave. And he had to, to keep you safe from not only his issues about going to fight his sister, but something else that could come after you. Something that he couldn’t help but think was coming back to haunt him. The dreams that plagued his mind. He might be paranoid, but he wasn’t so sure anymore. Plus, there might have been a reason that his sister was coming to return only now.

He rested a small kiss on your forehead as he stroked a tear that had fallen onto your face from his.

“I love you, my queen” he whispered, subconsciously wishing that you would wake up and ask him where he was going, thwarting his plan. But you didn’t stir, and Loki was forced to walk out of the hospital room, stifling a small sob as he hoped and prayed to some unknown force that he would see you again.

Loki stared up at the titan in front of him, his limbs wanting to give out and just collapse onto the floor. He thought he’d never see him again. He never wanted to see him again. The only person who could compete with a god like him, as much as he’d disliked to admit it. He had a plan in his head as to what he would do. He always had a plan. But this was the first time that he was unsure of what would happen. Would Thanos figure out what he was doing and be one step ahead of him? This was something that was wracking his brain constantly as he stared up at the Titan’s menacing stature and this was when he realised that this was the first time, he’d been holding onto blind faith to keep him alive.

Loki looked over at Thor, and placed one single mental thought into Thor’s mind, in order for him to hold onto something good. 

“I love you brother. Please, look after them” he projected as he held out the tesseract in front of the person he’d feared most in the world, preparing to die…

You kept telling yourself it couldn’t be true. He was alright. What Thor had told you wasn’t true. He was okay. He was safe. This wasn’t true…

This wasn’t true…

You sobbed a little but mostly maintained quiet. You felt numb. You couldn’t feel anything. You wanted to think about his face. The curves and the edges that made up his beautiful features but you couldn’t. Thinking about his face and how desperately you wanted to see him, talk to him, touch him. It all hurt too much.

He promised you he’d be there. He promised. And you’d promised him. Why couldn’t you have been there? Why weren’t you together?

“I’m so sorry, Y/N” Thor had said, although you were barely acknowledging his presence. His voice was mostly white noise as your brain had become a stormy sea, making you unsure of where to go and whether you’d survive. Everything was left up to chance and you were scared of what you were going to do. He was gone…Loki was gone.

You’d begun to register what was happening and a loud sob wracked through your body. Pain begun to flow through your arms and legs and chest not only from your injuries, but from a pain much greater than you’d been suffering the past few weeks. Thor started to cry as well, and he held you in his arms, completely engulfing you in his massive arms. You appreciated it. But it wasn't’t the same as him. God, it wasn’t the same.

“He’ll pay for what he’s done Y/N” Thor choked “I promise”, and you continued to sob into his chest. You had no idea what you’d do now, but you knew one thing. You continued to let every single ounce of pain flow through your body and out through your mouth into chokes sobs and screams as you said the only thing that you could express at this point, your short screams being released in between your words.

“Make…him…pay”

Pain begun to flow through your arms and legs and chest not only from your injuries, but from a pain much greater than you’d been suffering the past few weeks. Thor started to cry as well, and he held you in his arms, completely engulfing you in his massive arms. You appreciated it. But it wasn't’t the same as him. God, it wasn’t the same.

“He’ll pay for what he’s done Y/N” Thor choked “I promise”, and you continued to sob into his chest. You had no idea what you’d do now, but you knew one thing. You continued to let every single ounce of pain flow through your body and out through your mouth into chokes sobs and screams as you said the only thing that you could express at this point, your short screams being released in between your words.

“Make…him…pay”

trail.content_raw:
A/N: I’m gonna kill y’all I’m so sorry but don’t worry this isn’t the last chapter. Also, this is a slightly altered version of Infinity war/Ragnarok so it would fit with the continuity with my story so sorry if it’s a bit messy 

Warnings: Angst 

Words: 857

Masterlist

Loki had walked over to your hospital bed, staring at you whilst you slept as he tried to figure out what he was going to do about his current situation. Thor had sent him a message from Asgard of all places, that the land was under threat and he needed Loki to help him reclaim the throne. That could only mean one thing. His father was dead. It wasn’t even that long ago that Loki could remember wanting that throne for himself. Wanting to take what his father was going to pass on to Thor. Wanting what he knew he would never get. Now…he wanted nothing to do with any of that. All he wanted was you.

He rested his eyes on you again and a small tear fell down his cheek as you continued to sleep. He wanted to tell you where he was going, what was going on, and more importantly; that he would be back to hold you in his arms once again and that he was going to be back. But it was better not to explain. You wouldn’t let him leave. And he had to, to keep you safe from not only his issues about going to fight his sister, but something else that could come after you. Something that he couldn’t help but think was coming back to haunt him. The dreams that plagued his mind. He might be paranoid, but he wasn’t so sure anymore. Plus, there might have been a reason that his sister was coming to return only now.

He rested a small kiss on your forehead as he stroked a tear that had fallen onto your face from his.

“I love you, my queen” he whispered, subconsciously wishing that you would wake up and ask him where he was going, thwarting his plan. But you didn’t stir, and Loki was forced to walk out of the hospital room, stifling a small sob as he hoped and prayed to some unknown force that he would see you again.

[[MORE]]

Loki stared up at the titan in front of him, his limbs wanting to give out and just collapse onto the floor. He thought he’d never see him again. He never wanted to see him again. The only person who could compete with a god like him, as much as he’d disliked to admit it. He had a plan in his head as to what he would do. He always had a plan. But this was the first time that he was unsure of what would happen. Would Thanos figure out what he was doing and be one step ahead of him? This was something that was wracking his brain constantly as he stared up at the Titan’s menacing stature and this was when he realised that this was the first time, he’d been holding onto blind faith to keep him alive.

Loki looked over at Thor, and placed one single mental thought into Thor’s mind, in order for him to hold onto something good. 

“I love you brother. Please, look after them” he projected as he held out the tesseract in front of the person he’d feared most in the world, preparing to die…

You kept telling yourself it couldn’t be true. He was alright. What Thor had told you wasn’t true. He was okay. He was safe. This wasn’t true…

This wasn’t true…

You sobbed a little but mostly maintained quiet. You felt numb. You couldn’t feel anything. You wanted to think about his face. The curves and the edges that made up his beautiful features but you couldn’t. Thinking about his face and how desperately you wanted to see him, talk to him, touch him. It all hurt too much.

He promised you he’d be there. He promised. And you’d promised him. Why couldn’t you have been there? Why weren’t you together?

“I’m so sorry, Y/N” Thor had said, although you were barely acknowledging his presence. His voice was mostly white noise as your brain had become a stormy sea, making you unsure of where to go and whether you’d survive. Everything was left up to chance and you were scared of what you were going to do. He was gone…Loki was gone.

You’d begun to register what was happening and a loud sob wracked through your body. Pain begun to flow through your arms and legs and chest not only from your injuries, but from a pain much greater than you’d been suffering the past few weeks. Thor started to cry as well, and he held you in his arms, completely engulfing you in his massive arms. You appreciated it. But it wasn't’t the same as him. God, it wasn’t the same.

“He’ll pay for what he’s done Y/N” Thor choked “I promise”, and you continued to sob into his chest. You had no idea what you’d do now, but you knew one thing. You continued to let every single ounce of pain flow through your body and out through your mouth into chokes sobs and screams as you said the only thing that you could express at this point, your short screams being released in between your words.

“Make…him…pay”
